::Feline::

She purred loudly showing her pleasure in him petting her.  She 
looked up at him, looking into his eyes.  She took her paw and placed 
it on his thigh.  She meowed softly and purred at him.  He was her 
leader and she would have to treat him as such. And she wanted to 
treat him well.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Sorry if I take a while to reply, my comp is in the proccess of 
dying.
> 
> ::Zardus/Bloodystrike::
> 
> Zardus looks down at Feline, his hand petting her head. He sits 
back down on 
> his seat, his hand going from her neck to her torso. He looks 
around, waiting 
> for Skulletron to get there.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Bloodystrike is thrown back by Skulletron's missiles, jumping 
behind a panel 
> when he gets to his feet.
> 
> "Hey, stop firing! We need to go see Zardus!" he yells, ducking 
down behind 
> the console.
